price: Sε εyε wo Wura Nyankopɔn pε a, anka Ɔbεyε nnipa nyinaa ͻman baako. Na akyinnyeε deε wͻnnyae gyeε da;
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka lajaʿala al-nāsa ummatan wāḥidatan walā yazālūna mukh'talifīna
